definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: A shower of plasma followed by a shower of glass from exploding light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 電燈泡爆炸後，與玻璃碎渣一同四濺的是等離子體。

sentences.english: With his team of workers, he invented an electric light bulb, the phonograph.
sentences.chinese: 他作出了六千項發明，包括電燈泡，留聲機和油印機。

sentences.english: You two go ahead to the movie without me,i don’t want to be a third wheel.
sentences.chinese: 你們兩個自己去看電影吧，我不想當電燈泡。

sentences.english: A mother-in-law on a honeymoon is a fifth wheel.
sentences.chinese: 度蜜月時，丈母孃是個大電燈泡。

sentences.english: A 100-watt light bulb designed for outdoor use can also provide warmth.
sentences.chinese: 爲戶外使用而設計的一百瓦電燈泡也能提供溫暖。

sentences.english: Simon Rhymes uses powerful light bulbs instead of boiling water to cook the egg.
sentences.chinese: 萊姆斯是用大功率電燈泡代替沸水將雞蛋弄熟的。

sentences.english: I had to become the fifth wheel when jim and Jone's girl-friends came to them.
sentences.chinese: 當吉姆和喬的女朋友來看他們時，我好像成了電燈泡。

sentences.english: Tonny: No, I don't want to be the third wheel.
sentences.chinese: 哦，不要了，我可不想當電燈泡哦。

sentences.english: Tap twice quickly on the image of the door below, just like you would double-click a mouse button.
sentences.chinese: 請按一下筆的按鈕，然後按下電燈泡的圖像。

sentences.english: His 6,000 inventions included the electric light bulb, the phonograph, and the mimeograph machine.
sentences.chinese: 他的六千項發明，包括電燈泡，留聲機和油印機。

sentences.english: How many QUT students does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一個電燈泡旋進電燈需要多少QUT的學生？

sentences.english: An electric light bulb with a filament of thin platinum!
sentences.chinese: 這是一個細鉑燈心的電燈泡。

sentences.english: But again, the expense of platinum prevented him from producing the bulb commercially.
sentences.chinese: 但再次地，昂貴的鉑金阻止他在商業上推廣電燈泡。

sentences.english: The electric light bulb is in an alabaster bowl.
sentences.chinese: 這電燈泡裝在一個雪花石膏似的燈罩裏。

definition: dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
(usu used in the negative) to be of importance or to matter/to be in the way/to be a hindrance
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
